recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Heat the olive oil in a pan and sauté the chopped onion and garlic until translucent.
Add the minced beef and cook until browned.
Add the canned tomatoes, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti.

comments.message: Loved it! My family enjoyed it.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Cut the chicken breast into bite-sized pieces.
Heat the vegetable oil in a pan and sauté the chopped onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.
Add the chicken pieces and cook until browned.
Add the curry powder and cook for another minute.
Pour in the coconut milk, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Serve with rice.

comments.message: Loved it! My family enjoyed it.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Chop all the vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat the sesame oil in a pan and sauté the chopped onion and garlic until translucent.
Add the bell pepper, carrot, and broccoli. Stir fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add the soy sauce, salt, and pepper. Cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot.

comments.message: Loved it! My family enjoyed it.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Heat the vegetable oil in a pan and sauté the chopped onion and garlic until translucent.
Add the ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in the taco seasoning, salt, and pepper. Cook for another 5 minutes.
Warm the taco shells according to the package instructions.
Fill the taco shells with the beef mixture and top with lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.

recipes.name: Pancakes
instructions: In a bowl, mix the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk the milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and pour 1/4 cup of batter for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve with syrup and your favorite toppings.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Season the chicken breast with salt and pepper.
Heat the olive oil in a pan and cook the chicken breast until golden brown and cooked through. Let it cool and slice it.
Chop the romaine lettuce and place it in a large bowl.
Add the croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing. Toss to combine.
Top the salad with the sliced chicken breast.
Serve immediately.
